/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of pink and white, stand out against the clear blue sky. They are adorned with balconies and windows, adding architectural interest to the scene. The trees, devoid of leaves, reach towards the sky, their bare branches suggesting a winter or early spring season. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows on the ground and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
